name: ParaParaParadise 1st Mix Plus
overview:
The Para Para Paradise 1st Mix PLUS, which was a far step up from the other versions. It cleaned up alot of the initial problems with the game and supplied many more songs and routines for the players. On top of that it also featured everything from the previous mixes minus the Korean songs from Para Para Dancing.

The Para Para Paradise series is a more specific dance game requiring players to perform a dancing routine in order to pass.

Para Para mode: The main aim of this mode is to dance the real Para Para dance. The arrows that move up the screen in this mode correspond with the same action/routines that is used in the real Para Para dance. For example, the arrows on the screen will lead the player into the direction to place their hands, similar to the actions made in the real life Para Para dance. To really get the most out of this mode, players need to know the whole routine.

Freestyle mode: This mode does not have any instructions on what style a player should dance. Basically, a player can just swing their arms everywhere and pass the stage. The arrows in this mode range from three difficulities: Normal, Hard and Expert.
